snippet: The U.N. Security Council on Wednesday viewed "horrific pictures of corpses" from the scene of last week's massacre in South Sudan and discussed taking actions that could include sanctions, diplomats said....

headline.print_headline: UN Considering Sanctions Over South Sudan Massacre
headline.main: UN Considering Sanctions Over South Sudan Massacre

lead_paragraph: The U.N. Security Council on Wednesday viewed "horrific pictures of corpses" from the scene of last week's massacre in South Sudan and discussed taking actions that could include sanctions, diplomats said.
